dialogue.name: Grimdor
dialogue.text: Oh, it seems the summoning worked! I am Grimdor, the Wizard of the 'Gray Tower!'

dialogue.name: Grimdor
dialogue.text: You must be wondering why I summoned you here. Anyway let us go over the basics.

dialogue.name: Grimdor
dialogue.text: You're in the land of 'Thorium', subject to a battle that has lasted through the eons by the Demonic  and Angelic forces.

dialogue.name: Grimdor
dialogue.text: In the midst of this you'll find the Human race.

dialogue.name: Grimdor
dialogue.text: I want YOU to put an end to this feud. Use whatever means necessary.
